# Pull Request

## Description
Please describe the purpose of this pull request. Include the script name (if applicable), what changes you made, and why.

## Related Issue
Link to the related issue (e.g., `#123`) or state "None" if this is a new contribution.

## Changes Made
- [ ] Added new installation script
- [ ] Updated existing script (specify which)
- [ ] Improved documentation (e.g., README.md files)
- [ ] Fixed a bug in a script (describe the fix)
- [ ] Added new distribution support
- [ ] Updated repository structure
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Checklist
- [ ] Scripts have been tested on the target Linux distribution(s).
- [ ] Scripts follow the existing naming conventions and structure.
- [ ] Documentation (README files) has been updated to reflect changes.
- [ ] Scripts include proper error handling and logging.
- [ ] Changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities.
- [ ] Scripts are idempotent where possible (safe to run multiple times).
- [ ] I have read and followed the contributing guidelines in the main README.

## Testing
Describe how the changes have been tested:
- [ ] Tested on [distribution name and version]
- [ ] Verified package installations work correctly
- [ ] Checked for script errors and edge cases
- [ ] Ensured backward compatibility

## Additional Notes
Add any other relevant information, such as dependencies required, special considerations, or testing instructions.
